Name: 1.0 Overview: Grammar/Voice based changes
Notes:
"The current feedback system on MLS becomes tedious and is time consuming when giving feedback for large classes. ezMarker cuts down time by allowing bulk grade and feedback upload with the use of the Brightspace API."

"becomes" should be "is' based off present active voice definition.

"Although designed to reduce time spend grading programming assignments, uploading feedback from the Autograder still takes considerable amounts of time using the conventional MLS feedback system."

"spend" should be "spent" grammar
